entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -34.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -38.5°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
